summary: This document appears to be a daily assignment roster or shift log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering dates in early August 2019. It lists shift assignments, sick leave, and overtime details for staff, and is significant as it dates to the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC prior to his death.

events.title: MCC Daily Assignment Log
events.description: A roster of staff assignments, sick leave, and overtime at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.context: Federal detention center where Jeffrey Epstein was held and died in August 2019.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019.
The log covers the third quarter of 2019 and includes entries for sick leave and assignments to the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
The document dates to the period immediately before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at MCC on August 10, 2019.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text; it appears to be an administrative log of staff shifts and assignments.
